Languages: English and Chinese Experience Senior Data Insights Analyst Yahoo March 2013  – Present (2 years 6 months) Business Intelligence Analyst eBay Inc January 2011  –  March 2013  (2 years 3 months) •	Projects: NPS, search relevance metrics, catalog measurement, smart bidding for online ads, AB testing, etc. 
•	Monitoring / Analyzing/Reporting all key business metrics, across share (CPC, CPA/Revenue share, etc.), category, channel (SEO, SEM, Organic etc.) and partner/customer segments in both US and international market to inform senior management on health of business and changes in market conditions. 
•	Analyzing / Model business performance and provide business decision support and strategic insight for both US and international Business of eBay/Shopping.com.  
•	Tracking / Analyzing key measurement metrics (Business / User behavior / NPS / NDCG etc.) for major product feature release (search relevance, front end, back end, catalog, etc.) using A/B, multivariate test and various statistical method such as T-test, Chi-square test, predictive model, time series and etc. 
•	Leading Project for Customer Satisfaction Survey (Net Promoter Score) including data collecting, tracking, analyzing, survey design by using advanced statistical method and data visualization method, such as sample size calculation, survey missing data analysis, correlation analysis, principal component factor analysis, etc. Presenting finding to stakeholders to make strategic roadmap for company. Production Analyst The Nielsen Company February 2010  –  December 2010  (11 months) •	Projects: Ad Relevance for US and International markets, Mobile Ad Relevance.  
•	Analyzed online/web measurement traffic & RDD survey data, developed business case provided business insight for new product features and market opportunities for Advertisers and publishers. 
•	Fulfilled data ad-hoc tasks and delivered data reports providing internet metrics and business insights using SQL, SPSS, SAS, EXCEL and internal tool.  
•	Executed Quality Assurance tasks & Statistical analysis on weekly online data using Pivot tables, Vlookup, advanced filters in Excel. Coordinated with Engineering and Product Management to resolve production data quality issues Practicum in Statistics California State University, East Bay June 2009  –  September 2009  (4 months) •	Stock Price Prediction and Portfolio Construction Using R 
•	Manipulated/analyzed 60000+ stock data (filter/sort/input/merge/graph) for price prediction. 
•	Constructed investment portfolio for individual stock by ARIMA/GLM/GARCH model. Math/Stat Modeling CUFN University January 2006  –  December 2007  (2 years) •	Received special training to apply stat/math methods to solve real world problems in limited time. 
•	Statistical analysis for postgraduate employment 
•	Designed experiment and surveys to find the key personality leading to a successful career.  
•	Analyzed the correlation between postgraduate employment satisfaction and personality/behaviors by using CPI table (California Psychology Inventory), Experiment Design, Principal Component Analysis (PCA), Exploratory Factor Analysis, Clustering Analysis, ANOVA, Regression Analysis under SAS, SPSS and Excel. 
•	Statistical Analysis of Health Status 
•	Analyzed 2000+ health data for university staff, Analyzed the factors causing high blood pressure. 
•	Built a model evaluating health status of university staff/faculty. Used experiment design, sample survey, GLM, ANOVA and linear regression method under SAS, SQL Database, Microsoft Excel, SPSS. •	Preformed A/B testing, multivariable analysis for Real Estate web user interface using business analysis tool.  
•	Assisted in the acquisition, processing, trouble shooting and analysis of data to support research projects.  
•	Target potential customers in the Real Estate Industry by statistical analysis on surveys; created customized reports and analytics by using SAS, SQL, Minitab and SPSS. 
•	Consulted with potential clients. Developed and built strong customer relationships. Summary Strong analytics program manager with excellent balance of project management and presentation skills. Talented at providing thought leadership and making informed decisions about consumer behavior, advertising effectiveness and product development. 
 
Passionate about turning data-driven analytics into compelling and visually appealing stories. 
 
Comfortable liaising with engineering, marketing, and sales, as well as translating business requirements across different stakeholders. Multilingual and multicultural with experience living and working abroad, and skilled communicating with diverse audiences. Experience User Analytics Manager, Creative Cloud Marketing Adobe April 2015  – Present (5 months) San Francisco Bay Area Work with product managers to determine drivers of user acquisition, conversion, and retention. Senior Business Analyst, Adobe Media Optimizer Adobe 2013  – Present (2 years) San Francisco Bay Area Increase advertising effectiveness and ROI for Adobe Media Optimizer through customer analytics, targeting optimization, and product enhancements. 
- Grew customer satisfaction and internal account management productivity through continual product enhancements, by turning user feedback into functional requirements, and working with engineering team to deliver releases.  
- Defined and enhanced a real-time Display Advertising interface through collaboration with Business Analytics, Account Management, Sales, and Engineering teams.  
- Drove 8% quarterly advertising ROI growth through spend reorganization based on enhanced data-driven campaign optimization. 
- Grew monthly client ad spend with Adobe by 5% by delivering the lowest ROI for two major clients in 2014. Senior Manager of Data Insights Yahoo, Inc. 2007  –  2012  (5 years) Data Insights Group, Sunnyvale, CA Managed, conducted, and presented Big Data customer insights projects utilizing behavioral, demographic, and advertising data to improve advertising effectiveness, ROI and increase user engagement. Built a self-service analytics tool for sales. Managed a team of two analysts and an intern. Major projects included: 
 
* Auto Pulse: defined and delivered a self-service analytics application providing on-demand Automotive search and behavioral data for Yahoo users, resulting in across-the-board CPM increases of 15% for automotive category. 
- Scoped the project by meeting with Account Management and Sales, gathered requirements, designed prototypes, and secured buy-in. Showcased the tool in a road show for Sales. Hired and managed engineering intern for development and implementation phases. 
 
* 12 Weeks of Christmas: delivered in-depth analysis of search and category trends on and off the Yahoo network in the 3 months prior to Holiday Shopping Season. Following the presentation to major retail clients, retail advertising spend with Yahoo increased by 5% annually.  
- Analysis detailed keyword-level search activity, as well as site visitations and referrals summarized by geographic and demographic segments. Presented findings at various seminars and conferences. 
 
* Search by Device: conducted a thought-leadership study highlighting differences in search patterns by device (computer/smartphone/tablet) and presented at SMX West (San Jose, Feb 2011)  
- Study looked at most searched categories by device, time-of-day, and location. Searches for leading social networking sites and major retailers were analyzed as well. Senior Data Insights Analyst Yahoo! 2005  –  2007  (2 years) Strategic Data Solutions Group, Sunnyvale, CA Managed and conducted analytical projects leveraging click stream data to provide valuable insights supporting strategic and tactical marketing decisions: 
 
* Analyzed and reported on search engagement metrics, segmenting the users based on usage of Yahoo Toolbar, Yahoo home page sets, and Yahoo as default search settings. 
 
* Developed user life-time value models for Toolbar distribution deals (jointly with Corporate Financeֹ). 
 
* Conducted behavioral study of newly-registered users, resulting in updated Marketing communication strategy, yielding monthly page-view lifts of 1.5% - 4%. 
 
* Collaborated with the Registration team to track abusive new user registrations, as analysis showed the effect of fraudulent registrations on page-view inflation to be between 5% and 20% across Yahoo network. Market Research Analyst, Analytic Information Group Inofrmation Resources, Inc. 2002  –  2005  (3 years) Greater Chicago Area Performed client market research projects utilizing various statistical techniques and provided specific revenue improvement recommendations: 
 
* Sourced orders for new client projects in marketing research, gather requirements, budget, feasibility, and insure on-time deliverables. 
 
* Conducted promotion analysis for clients using multiple regression techniques and analysis of variance. Average promotion sales lifts reported were between 2% and 5%. 
 
* Led marketing mix projects for Sarah Lee, Kellogg’s, and ConAgra Foods, yielding sales lifts of between 1-4%. Senior Planning Specialist United Airlines, Inc. 2000  –  2001  (1 year) Greater Chicago Area | Served as a point-of-contact for STAR Alliance business development and route planning projects and maintained monthly operations reports: 
 
* Co-led the project on creating a common passenger database, yielding cost savings of over $2M annually due to increased efficiency, resulting in United’s annual savings of $1.5M (jointly with Lufthansa). 
 
* Led the project to update company’s flight cost model resulting in savings of 5% per flight.
